Articles.Content: Every time I get out of my craft on the moon my thing says monopropellant deprived but when I turn on infinite fuel the doesn't do anything and I had a large craft that had all its aerodynamic pieces fall of specifically if they where attached to the side boosters as well as the boosters them selves which would come of but the game thought they were still attached
Correction, I meant Mun, my mistake.
I was able to solve this issue when this happened to me by saving and then loading that save. Saving and restarting the game might work too.
